I'm a self-taught designer with experience in design systems, prototyping, typography, user experience, brand identity & technology. I've worked across Telecommunications, Automotive, Consumer Packaged Goods and Fashion. I’m currently a Design Director at R/GA NY

Andy Catch

Phase:

This phase is essentially a sketch pad, “zoomed out” perspectives on work groupings (notably “Vision” and “Systems”). In the future I’ll be looking to build out more thorough case studies.

Acknowledgement:

I grew up on unceded Gadigal land. I acknowledge the traditional owners, and pay my respects to Elders past and present. Always was, always will be Aboriginal land. I currently live and work on the land of the Munsee people of the greater Lenape Nation, and respectfully acknowledge their traditions, language and culture.
